website_summaries.verdict: A good suit to get toddlers, preschoolers, and early elementary-age children through chilly swim lessons.
pros: Great for chilly swim lessons, surfing, and spending time at the pool or lake
Smooth Skin front and back panels
Reinforced back zipper with zipper pull
cons: Consider sizing down for shorter or slender children and ordering up for heavier or taller children

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 years old. He is very tiny and weighs approximately 25 pounds. This wet suit enables hours of fun when before he would begin to shiver after only 15 minutes of being in the pool. The suit is thick, not heavy, and easily zips on and off. I would recommend trunks as underwear. Remember this is made to keep them warm, take off when not in water. This picture only reflects him trying it on. It Is not for inside use.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Keeps child warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for swim lessons and it has made such a difference! Before we purchased the wet suit my son would be shivering with blue lips within 10 mins of the lesson. He is extremely skinny with 0 body fat! The first day with the wetsuit he swam for an hour and could have stayed in longer! When he got out and I took the wet suit off his skin was so warm! Best purchase! So worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit !!!
customer_reviews.text: Every time my baby uses the suit he gets so many compliments. This wetsuit keeps my 1 -year-old son extremely warm in the pool. He used to cough and get a fever prior to us using the wet suit. Now he doesn't catch a cold at all after swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Slanger

customer_reviews.title: Little guy looks ready to train with the dolphins.
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been a perfect gift to my 4 yr old son. He is 42” and weights 36 pounds and size 3(like recommended by others on here) fits him just right with some room to grow. Might upgrade in 8-9months but it’ll get plenty of use. Kept him warm the entire time and while my wife and I were freezing he said he was warm. A bit of a struggle to get on and off but wetsuit are a bit snugged to begin with. My son loved it and thought he looked pretty cool in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lgmz

customer_reviews.title: This worked like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally do reviews but this was worth it. I purchased for my 3 year old son's swimming lessons. He gets extremely cold in the water and normally I have to take him out within a few minutes due to him shivering. This worked like a dream. He was a totally different kid in swim lessons. He stayed in for the entire class and never fussed. He commented how warm he was after getting out and how much enjoyed it. I purchased a size 2 so it would be a little bigger. He's tall but tiny and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Partridge

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but faulty zipper
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this. It fit my daughter great and I wanted it to keep her warm. It does keep her warmer than just a swimsuit but she still shivers in the pool. It’s a regular pool, not overly cold. The reason for 2 stars is that the zipper broke after the 2nd use. For such a pricey suit I feel that shouldn’t happen. And I have not washed it. I’ve only rinsed and air dried so I haven’t been rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my skinny 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is awesome!! Well built. Cute. Keeps my skinny 3-yr-old warm. We swim in an outdoor pool and I'm trying to extend our "season". Prior to this suit, we had a sprint suit with lycra arms and my son would get shivery in about 10-15 minutes. With this suit on, he gets out and uses the diving board and can stay in the water at least 45 minutes before even starting to show signs of being cold. I guess the major CON is that now I am the one getting cold and we have to kick our son out before he's ready!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great, and had no odd smell
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 years old. I bought her a size 3 which fit too exact for me. The crotch area was also too low. I will return for a larger size. Quality is great, and had no odd smell.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep toddlers warmer in the pool
customer_reviews.text: This helped out little guy stay comfortable in the pool for swim lessons. And he looks so darn cute in it! Really well made, nice amount of insulation for an indoor pool. Keeps my son much more comfortable - no more blue lips! Also adds some flotation which is nice for him - I think he feels more confident in the pool because of that
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I ever made for my little swimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this wonderful suit, my two year old enthusiastically and happily goes into the pool and ocean. He's thin - not much body fat and normally shivers and turns blue -- but not any more. Excellent quality. Best purchase I made. I ordered a bigger than normal size for him because he is tall and I put thermals underneath and it keeps him nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Goodheart

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit, long torso, short legs
customer_reviews.text: Cute wetsuit, but very odd fit. The torso is extremely long/big and the legs are extremely short. It says it’s for slender kids but I don’t see how. It seems more for short kids with large bellies, or for a penguin.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old grandson is 40 " tall and weights 44#'s. The size 4 fits him well with a little room to grow. He loves it for swim class! No more shivering and blue lips. There was a slight odor at first. I bought the O'Neill cleaner and conditioner and the smell was gone after one washing by hand. Will definitely buy O'Neill agin when he outgrows this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Berman

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome wetsuit. My 3 year old is small but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome wetsuit. My 3 year old is small but this fit her great. It has gotten her through many swimming lessons that she would've been too cold for and kept her happy at the beach for hours. If you want to keep your child swimming comfortably in cooler/cold water this is a must buy. The color is beautiful, people are always asking where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Due to health issues he does not have a lot of fat on him and gets super cold in water even when it is hot outside
customer_reviews.text: This wet suit was exactly what we needed for our son. Due to health issues he does not have a lot of fat on him and gets super cold in water even when it is hot outside. We found this online and it is perfect! Keeps him nice and toasty when we are in an indoor pool. So glad we have this, we need to get a new one now that he has grown a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer La Torre

customer_reviews.title: Fits grate
customer_reviews.text: Fits like me it should. Iv been scuba for 35 years and o'neill has been there making gear . There are cheaper setups but a trusted brands are trusted for a reason
customer_reviews.author: hunt

customer_reviews.title: Love this wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this wet suit! We took it on vacation for our toddler. He loved it and we loved it because he was happy and comfortable the whole time! Excellent quality. *I did fold up the legs and wrists a bit
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Kali

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: It was better then expected! Beautiful... When i first opened the package and saw the product, i thought it would not fit my little 4 yr. But it fit perfect with room to grow into it..love the outfit. Now she wont be so cold coming out of the water and we can have longer time at the beach. Looking forward for her to wear it with our Southern Califonia weather...
customer_reviews.author: JANICE SINGH

customer_reviews.title: It worked great at swim lessons
customer_reviews.text: My two year old girl is maybe 37” tall and about 28lbs... plenty of room to grow length wide in the torso but the arms and legs were not nearly as long as I was expecting or hoping. I guess it will be ok if her arms/legs start showing more as she grows. I wouldn’t want any more room in the torso. It worked great at swim lessons! I wish they wouldn’t keep those pools so cool.
customer_reviews.author: ABCT

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail today for our tall and thin 2.5 year old daughter (she's about 36 inches tall and 25 lbs). Fits well and seems like the right thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Great!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product...happy with purchase! My toddler is happily snorkeling in the beaches of Hawaii...
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Only gave it four stars because the seems are starting to get this bally worn look only after a few uses and I always hang it up
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this suit. He is always cold so we got one for indoor pool swimming. He can move freely in it. He is a size 4T-5T boys. Only gave it four stars because the seems are starting to get this bally worn look only after a few uses and I always hang it up to dry and take really good care of this suit.
customer_reviews.author: tina lenauer

customer_reviews.title: Size 2 Did not fit 18 month old but Looks well made
customer_reviews.text: So I cant say we used the product as it fit too large for my 18 month old. I ordered size 2 after reading some of the reviews and questions. Having said that I will probably be ordering from them in the future. The product seems well made and it looks like it would fit snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wetsuit, my son could now play in the splash pad without freezing. Totally worth the buy. He's 2 years old and weighs 35 pounds he's a big boy so 3T fit him perfect with room for him to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is our third one of the exact same suit. My daughter started surfing when she was 4 and as she has grown we just keep moving up sizes. She says it is comfortable and keeps her warmer in the cooler months. Plus the color is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: bhearn

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my four year old a teeny bit loose but nothing that affects functionality. He says its so comfortable, he swims great in it, Keeps him warm in a pool that was turning his lips blue before we got the suit. He is very fussy about the way pants feel on his legs and he's made no complaints about this suit. I wash in washer and hang to dry. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Noticed that it wrinkles easily if not hung up
customer_reviews.text: bought for my granddaughter 6 yrs just starting to show interest; will use in summer; material felt a little thinner than our other wet suits? I hope this holds up. Noticed that it wrinkles easily if not hung up; some wrinkles don't seem to come out? If it doesn't tare next summer it will have been a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nikado3

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, only worn once and the taking it off the zipper broke. Not sure how great the quality is.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for..
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is a savior. My daughter didn't seem to be enjoying her swim classes earlier as she would feel cold and shiver at times. We needed a swimsuit that not only fits her perfectly and keeps her warm enough. Thought bit pricey, it serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: jyothirmai

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my 2 year old! He has very thin build and shivers within 5 minutes of getting in the pool. But he absolutely loves to play in the water. With this wetsuit, he can stay in the water however long he wants without getting cold. Size one fits him very well (he is 30 months old, weighs 26 lbs) but will have to go up a size for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Eyeroll

customer_reviews.title: Warm suit, manufacturer sizing seems accurate
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old daughter is a skinny kid, and despite having swimming lessons in a heated pool is shivering with blue lips 10 minutes in. I was torn between a shorty wetsuit and a full wetsuit to keep her warm, I am glad that I ordered the full length. She is 39" and 31lbs. Size 2 fits her perfectly as per the manufacturer's sizing chart. Worked very well to keep her warm today for her swim lesson
customer_reviews.author: J. Slomka

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 7 and barely weighs 50lbs and every time he gets in water, poor kid freezes after 15-20 minutes. Now he uses the wet suit in every water activity whether it's the beach, a pool, lake, etc. We are so happy with our purchase! My only regret is that I did not purchase one sooner for him.
customer_reviews.author: Minh Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Best wetsuit for swimming in cold pools. My son is 5 and 4-5 fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mycici

customer_reviews.title: Loved these suits for my girls
customer_reviews.text: Loved these suits for my girls. They are a tiny 5 and 7 and only 36 and 38 pounds and 3.5 feet. I got a size 3 and they worked and kept their little bodies warm in swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I purchased this based on reviews and thought I should leave one. 3 year old was COLD in his swimming class. He didn't ever want to get in or fully participate, after going to what I think is the extreme for getting him this, I must say he's so much happier. Worked well, no odor after each use. He's about 36in and 32lbs, youth 2 was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put on while dry and point toes down as you pull it on!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wetsuits! Bought 2 of them for my youngest grandchildren who traveled with us to Glacier National Park. They were able to swim in a glacial waters lake at our campground wearing these suits and water shoes. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Stinchfield

customer_reviews.title: They do a good job adding a extra layer of warmth for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time purchasing a set of these. They do a good job adding a extra layer of warmth for a boys and they have good mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality wetsuits for toddler. Wish they could make it with even thicker materials.
customer_reviews.author: SPRING

customer_reviews.title: works great! fits good
customer_reviews.text: i got size 3 for my 3 years 8 month son. works great! fits good, my son is very comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old! He loves the beach so this wetsuit will definitely be used till he grows out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C. Avila

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We have used it several times and works great. Fits my 3 year old perfectly. Keeps him warm in chilly conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Calabrese

customer_reviews.title: These were great for my toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my toddlers. We live on a colder lake and they allow the kids to swim for a while without getting cold.
customer_reviews.author: M. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a 5 yr old 35-40 lbs did ...
customer_reviews.text: After almost 1 yr. Good fit for a 5 yr old 35-40 lbs did have a bit of room but did the job of keeping her warm in the pool. Before she couldn't last 30 mins in the pool but can now stay for 1 hr no problem.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: True to size and made well
customer_reviews.text: This suit is true to size and made with quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Price

customer_reviews.title: Warm durable swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and keeps us from having to cover her in sunscreen! Really great! Why buy a suit?
customer_reviews.author: Keri Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my thin 4 year old warm! She is ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my thin 4 year old warm! She is about 29 lbs, 39 inches and I got her a size 2. has made a huge difference at the pool for her.
customer_reviews.author: sabr

customer_reviews.title: My son finally stayed the whole swimming lesson with this on!
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling wetsuit! Some complained about the smell which I was concerned about but it really doesn't smell bad at all. Very nice feel to it and easy to get on. After the leaving the first two swimming lessons with my son crying because he didn't want to stay, he finally stayed the whole lesson smiling and happy with this wetsuit, this makes it all worth it! He is around 40 inches and 35 pounds. The size 3 fits him just tight enough but with room to grow. So happy with my purchase and he thinks he is "Aquaman" with this on.
customer_reviews.author: Raniya K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a pettite toddler! My son is 2 years and a half and it looks and feels great
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Moreno

customer_reviews.title: My son looks adorable in this suit and is no longer cold
customer_reviews.text: My son looks adorable in this suit and is no longer cold. We will use this year round indoor and out!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Well made wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product! My toddler (turned two a day ago) loves it. He's very sensitive to sand and it keeps it off his body so he can enjoy the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Keeps her warm and holds up beautifully. My second O'Neill suit.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too big on our son — quite heavy and durable material tho.
customer_reviews.author: Justine B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and it fits my daughter 2yrs for size 2
customer_reviews.author: Michael Le

customer_reviews.title: No more tears
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my 5years old warm in swimming class. No more tears!
customer_reviews.author: Luci B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly. Professionally packaged with clear instructions for best use. Great wet suit!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, as advertised, daughter loves it and doesn't get cold in the pool no longer. Problem now is I can't get her out of the pool now! Lol
customer_reviews.author: A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fits well with a little room for growth which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well with a little room for growth which is what I wanted. It will hopefully last one more year before having to buy a new wetsuit for my skinny son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, my daughter is an average 7-yr-old and it fit her tight.
customer_reviews.author: downeymom

customer_reviews.title: ... 1 the suit fit my 15 month old just fine, his height is 31 inches
customer_reviews.text: I bought toddlert size 1 the suit fit my 15 month old just fine, his height is 31 inches.
customer_reviews.author: ZUGUE YESENIA

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: My son can swim on our cold pool for more than 40 minutes with getting cold. This is perfect for him. Will buy again when he outgrows the wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good. My kids used to complain about feeling cold ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good. My kids used to complain about feeling cold when they go for swimming class until I bought them this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulla Essa Al Ali

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good suit.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this to keep my granddaughter warm in the pool while swimming. It is a very good suit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Provides hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Provides hours of fun. My son is very skinny and gets cold quickly. He loves water and now is able to swim for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on or take off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on or take off. We used it in mid 60s water on warm days. It's nice knowing that sunburn isn't an issue, and as an added bonus, if your little one gets drilled by shorebreak, their elbows or knees won't bleed. Great purchase. If you aren't lucky enough to live in a tropical climate, at least you won't worry too much about purple lips!
customer_reviews.author: Rob G

customer_reviews.title: Fits great for my small 3 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Fits great for my small 3 year old daughter. We use it at the beach in northern California where its cold and it keeps her warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leak somewhere
customer_reviews.text: Water leak inside, keep my daughter just a bit warmer than her regular swim suit. It looks tight but some where water is coming in. Very disappointed. Good for trick or treating only when it is dry it keep her warm. If wet not so much
customer_reviews.author: anh2

product_meta.title: O'Neill Toddler & Little Kids Neoprene Full Body Wetsuit for Slender Children
product_meta.description: Add warmth with an all-neoprene wet suit for little beachgoers and swimmers! Now with improved shaping in the body to better fit slender children, this comfortable wet suit fits babies, toddlers and preschoolers with slim to average builds well. Features: Easy on and off. Anatomical fit. Back zipper. 2mm Fluid Foam neoprene construction. Flatloc seams. #5 Zipper. Long arms and legs for full body protection.
feature_bullets: Back-zip wetsuit design to keep busy fingers from unzipping the suit - and to prevent neck irritation
Anatomical Fit for comfort and movement
2mm Fluid Foam construction to keep babies warm in swim classes
Add warmth with an all-neoprene wetsuit for little beachgoers & swimmers!
